rule: The category definitions can be loosely interpreted, allowing for flexibility and variation in classification across different inputs.
input: Business leaders attend a tech innovation summit.
validityText:
The input provided is a single sentence that appears to be a headline or a brief summary rather than a complete news article. According to the input specification, the input must be a string containing the text of a news article that represents a complete news article suitable for classification into one of the specified categories. Since the input does not contain the full content of a news article, it does not comply with the specification.
